descriptionMdByRank.1: [ATK](https://wutheringwaves.fandom.com/wiki/ATK) is increased by **12%**. Within 12s after dealing Echo Skill DMG, gain **32%** Resonance Skill DMG Bonus and **32%** Echo Skill DMG Amplification, and ignore **8%** of the target's [DEF](https://wutheringwaves.fandom.com/wiki/DEF) when dealing damage.
